√gṛdh 'be greedy'

present: [4.] gṛ́dhyati etc. V.+  

perfect: jagrdhus  jāgṛdhús  

aorist: [2.] ágṛdhat etc.  

future: [1.] gardhiṣyati   -- [2.] gardhitā  

verbal: gṛddha E.+  gṛddhvā  gṛdhitvā  

[secondary: jarīgṛdh-  jigardhiṣa-  gardhayati  ]

derivatives: gṛ́tsa?  gardha C.  gardhin V.+  gṛdhna E.  gṛdhnú V.+  gṛ́dhya AV.  gṛdhyā E.  gṛdhyin E.  gṛ́dhra V.+
